markdown: ###### Minor Positive reputation with [Neketaka](/neketaka/);[Chameleon's Touch](/chameleonsTouch/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Pūrākau | conc = | next = Bounty - Tāhae | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Marauder | guid = b60bafbd-35fc-4008-b731-8ad9125d714a }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Raider and gang leader Nomu the Marauder escaped custody with the rest of his crew. They fled to the wilderness northwest of Neketaka, leaving carnage in their wake and a bounty open to collect. ## Walkthrough * Located northwest of [Neketaka](/neketaka/), at 15° 51' S, 46° 11' E. Drops [Chameleon's Touch](/chameleonsTouch/). Not a problem at moderate levels. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Marauder.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Nomu the Marauder''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Raider and gang leader Nomu the Marauder escaped custody with the rest of his crew. They fled to the wilderness northwest of Neketaka, leaving carnage in their wake and a bounty open to collect. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Nomu.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Nomu and his reconvened gang were last spotted in the wilderness northwest of Neketaka. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Abocco.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Now that I've taken care of Nomu, Abocco at the Wild Mare in Queen's Berth will pay me handsomely for proof of the bounty. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed Nomu the Marauder and claimed the bounty reward from Abocco. |}
